subject: docs: comprehensive PWA documentation and vercel.json routing
body:
- Update vercel.json with sw.js and manifest.json routing
  - Add Service-Worker-Allowed header for root scope
  - Add Cache-Control headers for update detection
  - Exclude service workers from SPA catch-all rewrite
- Expand CLAUDE.md PWA documentation:
  - Cache version management instructions
  - Service worker coexistence explanation
  - Icon regeneration commands
  - Vercel configuration details
- Update HISTORY.md with complete PWA implementation log

https://claude.ai/code/session_017CVEz1rhrWxzjCYEaz2mZr
title: comprehensive PWA documentation and vercel.json routing
